game.name: Mana Spark
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A challenging action RPG with deep souls-like combat and rogue-like elements. Explore a dreadful dungeon and fight smart enemies that will plan and collaborate between themselves to defeat you.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A challenging action RPG with deep souls-like combat and rogue-like elements. Explore a dreadful dungeon and fight smart enemies that will plan and collaborate between themselves to defeat you.

reviewHighlights.text: It's a fairly short, but enjoyable roguelike. It offers four playable characters and, in my opinion, a lot of replay-ability. I'd recommend it :D
